usefulItems: paper muffin cases, 12-hole muffin tin, oven
title: Vegetable and hazelnut cheese muffins

ingredients.content: 100 g sunflower oil, plus extra for greasing
60 g medium-hard cheese (e.g. cheddar, gruyère etc.), cut into pieces (1,5 cm)
100 g carrots, cut into pieces (2.5 cm)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease or line a 12 hole muffin pan with paper baking cups and set aside.
Place cheese into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add carrots and hazelnuts and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil, milk and eggs and mix <b>8 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add flour, baking powder, salt and cayenne pepper and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add peas and mix <b>10 sec//speed 3<b> with aid of spatula. Transfer to prepared muffin pan, fill baking cups to nearly full and bake for 20-25 minutes (180°C). Serve warm or at room temperature.

hintsAndTricks:
Vegetable cheese muffins with pancetta:
Reduce salt to 1 tsp in step 5, then add 100 g pancetta or ham pieces with peas in step 6 and mix 10 seconds longer.
